title: 'spack install lmod' fails because of config.guess
body:
So, I tried to do the basic build, right out of the box, 
on a Power8 running RHEL 7.5.  Here's what happened:

/home/fossum
[fossum@fstgbfen1 ~]$ ls
spack  spack.bak
[fossum@fstgbfen1 ~]$ mv spack spack.bak2
